projects.title: QUIZ IT
projects.description: Quiz IT is a game-based learning platform that lets users create, share, play quizzes, making education and fun.

projects.title: BBCIncorp CRM
projects.description: BBCIncorp CRM is designed to manage customer company formations across 19 countries, utilizing React Flow Renderer to structure and visualize company systems efficiently.

projects.title: BBCIncorp Dashboard
projects.description: Simple, frictionless and easy-to-use platform to help you start your company in minutes.

projects.title: Whatsapp cloned
projects.description: Integrating WhatsApp into the CRM enables customer service teams to chat with users seamlessly, ensuring messages are permanently stored and not deleted over time, unlike WhatsApp Web.
